WIREFRAME SPECIFICATIONS
Interactive Website for ZUTE (Zambia Union of Teachers Empowerment)

DESIGN PHILOSOPHY
Three Core Principles:

Empowerment-First Design: Every element reinforces teacher dignity and capability
Mobile-First, Teacher-Accessible: Works on affordable devices with low bandwidth
Trust Through Transparency: Clear information, honest communication, visible impact

Voice & Tone:
Voice: Empowering, professional, inclusive
Tone: Confident, warm, and hopeful
Values: Integrity, Unity, Empowerment, Innovation, Service

Breakpoint Strategy: Breakpoints: Mobile (320-767px), Tablet (768-1023px), Desktop (1024-1439px), Widescreen (1440px+)

PAGE STRUCTURE
Site Map:
Home Page (DONE - DON'T TOUCH)
About ZUTE
ECOS (Investment Wing)
Membership(DONE - DON'T TOUCH)
What We Do (Programs & Services)
News & Media
Get Involved (Partners & Stakeholders)
Donations(To be done later)
Contact (DON'T TOUCH)

Footer(DONE - DON'T TOUCH)

GLOBAL ELEMENTS
A. Smart Navigation System

Mobile
│ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ [ZUTE Logo]                              [Join ZUTE] [Menu] │ │
│ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ Off-Canvas Menu: │
│ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ × │ │
│ │ Home │ │
│ │ About ZUTE │ │
│ │ ECOS Investment Wing │ │
│ │ Become a Member │ │
│ │ What We Do ▸ │ │
│ │ Advocacy & Representation │ │
│ │ Professional Development │ │
│ │ Economic Empowerment │ │
│ │ Community Impact │ │
│ │ News & Updates │ │
│ │ Partner With Us │ │
│ │ Donations │ │
│ │ Contact │ │
│ │ [Join ZUTE Today] │ │
│ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ │
│ Desktop (1440px+): │
│ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ [ZUTE Logo] About ECOS Membership Programs News │ │
│ │ Contact [Join ZUTE] │ │
│ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
Interactions:
Sticky on scroll: Becomes compact after 100px scroll
Dropdown on "What We Do" hover, Highlight current section
Smart CTA: "Join ZUTE" becomes "Apply Now" on membership page
Mobile: Smooth slide-in menu with overlay

ABOUT ZUTE PAGE
Goal:
Convey ZUTE's story, vision, mission, values, organizational structure, and leadership
Mobile Layout (320px)
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ PAGE HEADER │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Background: Teachers collaborating │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ About ZUTE │ │
│ │ Empowerment Our Agenda │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ │
│ OUR STORY │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Who We Are │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ [Combined paragraph about ZUTE and ECOS] │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ [Read more about our journey...] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ │
│ VISION & MISSION │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Our Vision │ │
│ │ To be the leading teachers' union in Zambia │ │
│ │ known for integrity, innovation, and sustainable │ │
│ │ empowerment through ECOS. │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Our Mission │ │
│ │ To promote, protect, and advance the interests, │ │
│ │ welfare, and professional development of teachers │ │
│ │ through advocacy, cooperation, and innovation. │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ │
│ CORE VALUES │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ What We Stand For │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Integrity │ │
│ │ Upholding honesty, accountability, and ethical │ │
│ │ leadership. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Unity │ │
│ │ Strengthening collaboration among teachers │ │
│ │ and stakeholders. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Empowerment │ │
│ │ Building capacity and confidence for teachers │ │
│ │ to thrive. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Innovation │ │
│ │ Embracing creativity and technology in │ │
│ │ achieving union goals. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Service │ │
│ │ Committed to serving educators and improving │ │
│ │ Zambia's education system. │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ │

Leadership cards: Click to open modal with full bio (when available)
Org chart: Interactive hover states showing details
Values: Subtle hover animation
Smooth scroll between sections
ECOS (INVESTMENT WING) PAGE

Goal:
Explain ECOS, its benefits, how to participate, and build trust
Mobile Layout (320px)
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ HERO SECTION │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Background: Growth imagery (upward arrows, people) │ │
│ │ ECOS │ │
│ │ Your Path to Financial Independence │ │
│ │ The Educators Cooperative Society │ │
│ │ [Join ECOS] [Learn How It Works] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ │
│ WHAT IS ECOS? │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Building Wealth Together │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ ECOS is ZUTE's investment wing, registered with │ │
│ │ the Ministry of Agriculture and Cooperatives. │ │
│ │ We create sustainable wealth-building opportunities │ │
│ │ designed by teachers, for teachers. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Through ECOS, we provide financial stability, │ │
│ │ investment opportunities, and collective economic │ │
│ │ power to improve the social and economic status │ │
│ │ of teachers in Zambia. │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ │
│ WHAT WE OFFER │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Investment Opportunities │ │
│ │ Access sustainable investment initiatives designed │ │
│ │ for long-term wealth building. │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Financial Services │ │
│ │ Affordable loans, savings programs, and financial │ │
│ │ products tailored for educators. │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Cooperative Ownership │ │
│ │ Be part of a member-owned cooperative where │ │
│ │ profits benefit all participants. │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Entrepreneurial Support │ │
│ │ Resources and training for teachers looking to │ │
│ │ start or grow their own businesses. │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ │
│ HOW IT WORKS │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Join ECOS in 3 Simple Steps │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Step 1: Become a ZUTE Member │ │
│ │ Join ZUTE to access all cooperative benefits. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Step 2: Register with ECOS │ │
│ │ Complete your ECOS membership registration. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Step 3: Start Investing │ │
│ │ Choose investment options that fit your goals. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ [Get Started Today] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ │
│ BENEFITS │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Why Join ECOS? │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ ✓ Sustainable income generation │ │
│ │ ✓ Collective economic power │ │
│ │ ✓ Professional financial guidance │ │
│ │ ✓ Member dividends and profit-sharing │ │
│ │ ✓ Access to capital for personal projects │ │
│ │ ✓ Financial literacy training │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ CALL TO ACTION │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Ready to Build Your Financial Future? │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Join ECOS today and take control of your │ │
│ │ economic empowerment. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ [Join ECOS Now] [Contact Us] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

│ │ [Get Started Today] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ │
│ BENEFITS (Two-column checklist) │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Why Join ECOS? │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ ┌────────────────────────┐ ┌────────────────────────┐ │ │
│ │ │ ✓ Sustainable income │ │ ✓ Member dividends │ │ │
│ │ │ generation │ │ and profit-sharing │ │ │
│ │ │ │ │ │ │ │
│ │ │ ✓ Collective economic │ │ ✓ Access to capital │ │ │
│ │ │ power │ │ for personal projects│ │ │
│ │ │ │ │ │ │ │
│ │ │ ✓ Professional │ │ ✓ Financial literacy │ │ │
│ │ │ financial guidance │ │ training │ │ │
│ │ └────────────────────────┘ └────────────────────────┘ │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ FINAL CTA (Full-width banner) │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Ready to Build Your Financial Future? │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Join ECOS today and take control of your economic empowerment. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ [Join ECOS Now] [Schedule a Consultation] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

Interactions:
FAQ accordion: Smooth expand/collapse
Step process: Animated progression on scroll
Benefit cards: Hover effects
CTA buttons: Clear hierarchy (primary/secondary)
WHAT WE DO (PROGRAMS & SERVICES) PAGE

Mobile Layout (320px)
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ PAGE HEADER │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ What We Do │ │
│ │ Empowering Teachers Through Action │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ INTRO │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ ZUTE serves teachers through four key areas: │ │
│ │ advocacy, professional development, economic │ │
│ │ empowerment, and community impact. │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ PROGRAM 1: ADVOCACY & REPRESENTATION │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Advocacy & Representation │ │
│ │ Your Voice in Policy and Practice │ │
│ │ We represent teachers' interests in national │ │
│ │ dialogue, labor negotiations, and education reform. │ │
│ │ ZUTE ensures fair treatment, improved working │ │
│ │ conditions, and policies that put teachers first. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ What We Do: │ │
│ │ • Policy engagement and reform advocacy │ │
│ │ • Labor negotiations and collective bargaining │ │
│ │ • Professional standards development │ │
│ │ • Legal support for members │ │
│ │ [Learn More] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ PROGRAM 2: PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Professional Development │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Growing Excellence in Teaching │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ ZUTE supports continuous learning through training, │ │
│ │ mentorship, and knowledge-sharing platforms that │ │
│ │ elevate your skills and career. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ What We Offer: │ │
│ │ • Capacity building workshops │ │
│ │ • Professional training programs │ │
│ │ • Mentorship opportunities │ │
│ │ • Knowledge exchange forums │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ [View Training Calendar] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ PROGRAM 3: ECONOMIC EMPOWERMENT │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Economic Empowerment │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Building Wealth Through ECOS │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Through our ECOS cooperative, ZUTE provides │ │
│ │ investment opportunities, financial services, and │ │
│ │ entrepreneurial support to improve teachers' │ │
│ │ economic status. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ What We Provide: │ │
│ │ • Investment opportunities │ │
│ │ • Affordable financial services │ │
│ │ • Entrepreneurial training & support │ │
│ │ • Cooperative ownership benefits │ │
│ │ [Explore ECOS →] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ PROGRAM 4: COMMUNITY IMPACT │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Community Impact │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Strengthening Education Beyond the Classroom │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ ZUTE engages in social development initiatives │ │
│ │ that strengthen the broader education ecosystem │ │
│ │ and empower communities across Zambia. │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Our Initiatives: │ │
│ │ • Community literacy programs │ │
│ │ • Youth mentorship projects │ │
│ │ • Social responsibility campaigns │ │
│ │ • Educational partnerships │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ [Read More] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ OTHER ACTIVITIES │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Additional Programs │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Podcasts & Media │ │
│ │ Amplifying teachers' voices through modern media │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Business Forums │ │
│ │ Connecting teachers with stakeholders and investors │ │
│ │ │ │
│ │ Digital Communication │ │
│ │ Modern platforms for engagement and transparency │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
│ CALL TO ACTION │
│ ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │
│ │ Experience the ZUTE Difference │ │
│ │ Join us and access programs that empower you │ │
│ │ professionally, financially, and personally. │ │
│ │ [Become a Member] │ │
│ └───────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

Interactions:

Form: Real-time validation with helpful error messages

Interest selection: Updates form fields and routing

Auto-response: Confirmation message after submission

COMPONENT SPECIFICATIONS

Animated Counters

Card Components
States:

Default: Card with subtle shadow
Hover: Slight elevation (scale 1.02), increased shadow
Active: Scale down (0.98)
Mobile: Tap feedback with ripple effect

Variants:

Service Card: Icon, title, description, CTA
News Card: Image, title, excerpt, date, category
Team Card: Photo, name, title, bio preview

Form Validation
Visual Feedback:

Valid: Green border with checkmark icon
Invalid: Red border with specific error message
Loading: Spinner with disabled submit button
Success: Checkmark animation + confirmation message
Error: Shake animation + retry option

Validation Rules:

Real-time validation on blur
Show errors only after user interaction
Clear, helpful error messages
Required fields marked with asterisk

Navigation
Desktop:
Mega-menu on "What We Do" on hover
Active state highlighting

Mobile:
Hamburger menu icon
Slide-in off-canvas menu

MICRO-INTERACTIONS CATALOG
Must-Have Animations:
Page Load:
Staggered fade-in for content sections
Hero text fade slides in from left, image from right
Stats counter animation on viewport enter
Scroll Effects:
Parallax on hero background (subtle, 0.5 speed)
Fade-in animations for sections entering viewport
Sticky navigation transform (height reduction)

User Feedback:
Button press effect (scale down 0.95)

Success/error toast notifications (slide in from top)

Loading skeleton screens for content

Hover States:
Card elevation on hover
Button color transitions (0.3s ease)
Image zoom on hover (subtle, scale 1.05)

Performance Guidelines:
Lazy load images and heavy content below fold
Keep animations under 500ms for snappy feel

ACCESSIBILITY SPECIFICATIONS
Screen Reader Support:
Proper ARIA labels for all interactive elements
Semantic HTML (nav, main, article, aside)
Logical heading hierarchy (h1 → h6)

Skip to main content link

ARIA live regions for dynamic content

Forms:
Associated labels for all inputs
Error messages linked to fields
Required fields clearly marked
Helpful placeholder text (not replacing labels)
Clear submission feedback

CONTENT STRATEGY

Content Matrix by Page:
Page	Primary Goal	Key Messages	CTAs
Home	Introduce ZUTE & drive membership	Empowerment, Unity, ECOS	Join ZUTE, Learn About ECOS
About	Build trust & credibility	Story, Values, Leadership	Become a Member
ECOS	Explain investment wing & drive participation	Financial empowerment, Wealth building	Join ECOS, Schedule Consultation
Membership	Convert visitors to members	Benefits, Value, Process	Apply Now, Contact Us
What We Do	Showcase programs & impact	Comprehensive support, Real results	Explore Programs, Join ZUTE
News	Keep stakeholders informed	Updates, Events, Insights	Subscribe, Read More
Get Involved	Attract partners & investors	Collaboration opportunities, Impact	Partner With Us, Invest in ECOS
Contact	Facilitate communication	Accessibility, Responsiveness	Send Message, Call Now

Tone by Audience:

Teachers (Primary):
Empowering, supportive, professional
"You deserve...", "We fight for...", "Your voice matters"

Partners/Investors (Secondary):
Professional, impact-focused, data-driven
"Transform education", "Sustainable impact", "National reach"

General Public (Tertiary):
Informative, accessible, community-focused
"Strengthening education", "Supporting teachers", "Building communities"

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA

Each Page Must:
Load in under 3 seconds on 3G connection
Display correctly on screens from 320px to 2560px
Have proper SEO meta tags and Open Graph data
Include working social sharing functionality
Track user interactions
Have error states and loading indicators

Each Interactive Element Must:
Provide immediate visual feedback
Have proper error states with helpful messages
Work on touch devices with appropriate tap targets
Maintain state where appropriate
Respect user preferences (motion, contrast)

BRAND CONSISTENCY

Typography:
Headlines: Bold, confident (e.g., Inter Bold, Poppins Bold)
Body: Clean, readable (e.g., Inter Regular, Open Sans)
Hierarchy: Clear distinction between h1, h2, h3, body

SECURITY CONSIDERATIONS
HTTPS everywhere
Form submissions with CSRF protection
Input sanitization and validation
Rate limiting on forms to prevent spam
Secure file uploads
Cookie consent banner
PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATION

Final Note:
The site should feel modern, hopeful, and empowering—a digital home that reflects ZUTE's mission of building a stronger future for Zambia's educators.

Ready for high-fidelity mockups and React component development.
